CustomField.formula: Quarter_Start_Date__c = CASE( MOD(FLOOR((MONTH(TODAY()) - 1) / 3), 4), 0, DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) - 1, 10, 1), /* Last year's Q4 */ 1, DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), 1, 1), /* Q1 */ 2, DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), 4, 1), /* Q2 */ 3, DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), 7, 1), /* Q3 */ NULL /* Default fallback */ )
CustomField.label: Is this Last Quarter?
